Release Notes:
What's New
  • Functionality to initiate a new Task Order​
  • Functionality to present projects for Step 1 & 2 Task Orders in a selection grid​
  • Functionality to present selected projects for Step 1 & 2 Task Orders in a results grid​
  • New Task Order table referencing FEMA process steps​
  • Functionality to calculate Step 1 & 2 Contractor unit cost​
  • Functionality to Edit, Cancel and Submit Task Order​
  • Functionality to Assign Sector Lead​
  • Updates to DRS To Do and Watch Lists​
  • Functionality to Assign and Submit Task Order to Contractor​
  • Functionality for Steps 1 & 2 Project Cost Amounts​
  • Functionality to include Sector as a required field for Step 1 & 2 Task Orders​
  • Functionality for Step 1 and 2, COR3 & Contractor LOE Negotiation - Accepted​
  • Functionality for Step 1 and 2, COR3 & Contractor LOE Negotiation - Not Accepted​
  • Updated User Role for Steps 1 & 2, Results Grid & Actions ​
  • Update naming convention from Vendor to Contractor​
  • Functionality for Steps 1, 2, LOE Negotiation Notes​
  • Functionality for Contractor User Role and Security​
  • Functionality for Contractor to Accept / Not Accept a Step 1 or 2 Task Order​
  • Functionality for Contractor to Agree/Disagree  and move back to Sector Lead Review​
  • Functionality for Step 3 Project Selection, Results Upper Grid and Scope of Work​
  • Functionality for Step 3, Results Grid & Actions​
  • Functionality to present Step 3, Contractor Title/Role dropdown & rates​
  • Functionality to Select Multiple Sectors for Step 1, 2 & 3 Task Orders​
  • Functionality for Contractor to provide Level of Effort (LOE) for Step 3 Task Order​
  • Functionality to create a new Task Order user role specific to COR3​
  • Functionality to exclude Projects in FEMA 'Process Discontinued' step from Step 3 Task Order Project Pool

Data Updates
  • Update Closeout Information to be updated 100%

Update
  • SSIS jobs start processing at midnight AST
  • Integration processing starts at 10:00 PM AST

Data Updates
  • Updates to remove False Negative Balances
  • Update to Recommended Amount
  • Update to associate expenses to RFRs

Bug Fixes
  • Added Add Documents action to DRS_Subrecipient role at Closeout stages

Bug Fix:
  • Fixed the Edit Batch Details action in RFR Batch
